original_text: When the lions become hungry, can you find food for the young lions to eat? When the lions become hungry, can you find food for the young lions to eat? When the lions become hungry, can you find food for the young lions to eat? When the lions become hungry,
korean_text: 네가 사자를 위하여 먹이를 사냥하겠느냐 젊은 사자의 식욕을 채우겠느냐

sentences.original_text: can you find food for the young lions to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 어린 사자들을 위해 먹을 음식을 찾을 수 있습니까
